attributes.action: Against human consuption of Dartmoor Hill Ponies
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to STOP Dartmoor Hill Pony Association launching a human consumption of Dartmoor pony scheme.

South West Equine Protection do not believe that continuing to overbreed to kill for anyone or anything's consumption is the best solution for the ponies or the common.
SWEP suggest stallion removal or vasectomising of stallions to maintain their stallion mentality.
